getTokenCountOfBundle(uint256).details: Returns the total number of assets in a particular bundle.

getTokenOfBundle(uint256,uint256).details: Returns an asset contained in a particular bundle, at a particular index.

getUriOfBundle(uint256).details: Returns the uri of a particular bundle.

documentation.text: @dev The address of the native token wrapper contract.
@dev Store / escrow multiple ERC1155, ERC721, ERC20 tokens.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct ITokenBundle.Token memory[] memory)

documentation.text: @dev Release stored / escrowed ERC1155, ERC721, ERC20 tokens.
@dev Transfers an arbitrary ERC20 / ERC721 / ERC1155 token.
@dev Transfers multiple arbitrary ERC20 / ERC721 / ERC1155 tokens.
